rows.label: tev073301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Tan'celeg about Orphean Technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Tan'celeg if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Tan'celeg about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Tan'celeg about Orphean Technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Tan'celeg about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Tan'celeg about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG0001
rows.name:
We've apparently been distributing weapons to humans
through the Sun'celeg-led Orphean Technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Now Ten'celeg and I have inherited that duty,
and will work together to produce the products.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Perhaps you're interested in easy-to-use weapons that
employ advanced ether- and gravitation-control
technologies, while also allowing for rapid movement?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Or in a wide lineup of protective wear that employs
proprietary camouflage technologies to attain levels
of evasion no other company could achieve?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG0005
rows.name:
In that case, I hope you'll put our products to use.
I promise that they'll always be a potent and efficient
choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG1001
rows.name:
We have completed the autosentries and sent them off
to the Biahno water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG1002
rows.name:
Thanks to the data we received from you,
we were able to create a more effective device than
we'd ever thought possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG1003
rows.name:
I don't know if the autosentries would be able to repel
an invader of your high caliber...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG1004
rows.name:
But I suppose that if such a mighty foe did appear,
it would not be the autosentry to which we turned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG1005
rows.name:
Instead, we would request aid from you BLADEs.
Should that day ever come, we'll be counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2001
rows.name:
Even out here, I am studiously developing new products
for Orphean Technologies in accordance with the duty
that I inherited from Sun'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2002
rows.name:
And of course, I rely on Ten'celeg's great talent to
develop my ideas into products people desire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2003
rows.name:
Perhaps you're interested in easy-to-use weapons that
employ advanced ether- and gravitation-control
technologies, while also allowing for rapid movement?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2004
rows.name:
Or in a wide lineup of protective wear that employs
proprietary camouflage technologies to attain levels
of evasion no other company could achieve?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2005
rows.name:
In that case, I hope you'll put our products to use.
I promise that they'll always be a potent and efficient
choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2010
rows.name:
To ensure that this debacle never occurs again,
I have decided to handle maintenance here myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2011
rows.name:
As an Orphean, I consider Lan'cord's actions to be
unforgivable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2012
rows.name:
This is the least I could doâ€”my Ovah would never
forgive me if I were to shirk this responsibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG2013
rows.name:
And I intend to make even more high-quality items for
Rosie, the one who protects New LA's water supply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG3001
rows.name: I hear that Lan'cord has been captured by BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG3002
rows.name:
That is one less danger that the water-purification plant
will have to face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG3003
rows.name:
However, indigen attacks remain a grave threat to
which we must be ever vigilant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073301_MSG3004
rows.name:
So I have been thinking for a while now that I should
make some high-quality items for Rosie, who guards
New LA's water supply.[ST:wait ]
